entry.title: Zeebox Launches in the US
entry.content: After many months of hard work Zeebox has finally launched in the US. This coincides with a new UK release too. We've added a load of great new features including a What's Hot section, an activity feed to see what you're friends have been doing, and a great new commenting system. Electric Labs has been working with Zeebox since July last year - how time flies! You can grab the UK version here and the US version here.
